name: Gun Simulator & Lightsaber
description:
Ready to drown in the asmr sounds of shotgun and pranks on your friends with gun sound and lightsabers!? Try the official version of 2023 Lightsaber app: Gun Simulator & Lightsaber!🔥🔥🔥

⚡Gun Simulator & Lightsaber⚡ contains all handles and gun modes you wish to own as a science fiction addict. You can experience futuristic & realistic 3D lightsaber and sci-fi gun effect all in sci-fi gun, shotgun, and lightsaber mode, in which you will be amazed by the stunning colors, many vivid visual & diffenrent shocking sound effects. Especially, you can customize the background, adjust color, turn on&off the flashlight and vibration, change weather condition when shoot, and shake or tap to fire to personallize your own gun saber with realistic 3D simulation. This app offers you with various asmr gunshot sounds and fun experience to prank friends & siblings. Besides, it's very useful to use this app for self-defense objectives as Gun Simulator & Lightsaber can intimate really realistic 3D lightsaber and gun effect ⚡

💥FEATURE💥
🔫 Lightsaber & shotgun sounds effects app offers you a wide collection of marvelous gun skins and gunshot sounds.
🔫 Experience unlimited sound effects of different machine gun or weaphones, all are distictive!
🔫 Realistic light saber with 1000+ awesome skins in style of epic, anime and scifi.
🔫 Stunning 3D graphics gun simulator with high quality effects.
🔫 SINGLE and AUTO Gunshots Gun Simulator by handshake.
🔫 Unlimited lightsaber gun Weaphones & various weapon sounds with different shooting environments.
🔫 First-choice laber sword weaphones or gunshot app to play with your friends and prank people.

⚠️Please note! Gun Simulator & Lightsaber includes realistic weapons' sound and visual effects, BUT it's just a game/ prank app, NOT a real dangerous weapon. Gun Simulator & Lightsaber app serves entertainment purpose only and won't harm anyone.
Download & Enjoy the simulation of laser battles & gun shot sound effects and become a real space soldier!
